question_text: What are Unity's Physics packages for DOTS (Unity.Physics)?

correct_answer: and integration with Jobs/Burst. Different from built-in PhysX; designed for massive entity counts in ECS.

question_text: Explain Unity's Netcode for GameObjects (formerly Netcode for Entities).
option_c: Netcode for GameObjects provides networking for DOTS and GameObjects. Features: prediction
correct_answer: and server-authoritative architecture. Part of Unity's multiplayer solution for high-performance networked games.

question_text: What is Unity's Unity Cloud and how does it integrate with other services?
option_c: Unity Cloud is platform for team collaboration: version control
correct_answer: and DevOps. Integrates with Unity Services for complete development-to-live-ops workflow. Cloud-based alternative to local infrastructure.

question_text: Explain Unity's future direction: Unity 6
option_c: Future
mdn_link: improved DOTS. Runtime Fee policy evolved after community feedback. Open Source: some packages (UI Toolkit) going open source. Focus on developer experience and performance.
